definition: a manner of marching in file in which each person's leg moves with and behind the corresponding leg of the person ahead
details:
noun
- a manner of marching in file in which each person's leg moves with and behind the corresponding leg of the person ahead
= example: a manner of marching in file in which each person's leg moves with and behind the corresponding leg of the person ahead
- a standard procedure that is followed mindlessly
= example: a standard procedure that is followed mindlessly
